# Peripheral Nervous System
- All the nerves that branch off from the brain
- Both directions
- Allow [Central Nervous System](Central%20Nervous%20System.qmd) to communicate with the body
- [Afferent](Afferent.qmd) + [Efferent](Efferent.qmd)
